meanings: [명사] interview, [동사] interview; (인터뷰 대상자가) give an interview; (기자 등이) have an interview (with)

vlive.korean: 팅클 인터뷰 재밌었나요? Did you enjoy the interview? 듣기 View video IZ*ONE : 까꿍🙈💕
나 이러고 인터뷰해도 돼요? Can I interview like this? 듣기 View video MONSTA X : [몬채널][B] EP.181 'FANTASIA' COMEBACK WEEK part.2
진짜... 반말 인터뷰 이거 힘들다... Seriously... It's difficult to be casual. 듣기 View video Dispatch : [ⓓxV] “뮤비 촬영 중 당황한 사연은?”┃미니 인터뷰 ② (보컬팀 : SEVENTEEN)
vlive.english: Seriously... It's difficult to be casual.

vlive.korean: 뭐야 인터뷰 - 귀여워~ - 인터뷰도 있었어? What? The interview! - So cute! - There was an interview? 듣기 View video Dispatch : IZ*ONE DICON UNBOXING
vlive.english: What? The interview! - So cute! - There was an interview?

vlive.korean: 반말로 인터뷰 해보는 것은 처음일 텐데 어땠어? It's the first time to have an informal interview. How did you feel? 듣기 View video Red Velvet : Red Velvet - IRENE & SEULGI 'Monster' 반말 인터뷰
vlive.english: It's the first time to have an informal interview. How did you feel?

examples.korean: The interview was recorded and then transcribed. 발음듣기 그 인터뷰는 녹음되었다가 뒤에 글로 옮겨졌다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The interview was recorded and then transcribed. 발음

examples.korean: The full transcription of the interview is attached. 발음듣기 그 인터뷰 기록 전문이 첨부되어 있습니다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The full transcription of the interview is attached. 발음

examples.korean: During the interview, she fumbled helplessly for words. 발음듣기 면접[인터뷰] 때 그녀는 말을 제대로 못 하고 난감하게 더듬거렸다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: During the interview, she fumbled helplessly for words. 발음

examples.korean: to give an interview 발음듣기 (질문받는 측에서) 인터뷰를 하다[인터뷰에 응하다] Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
Throughout the interview the journalists scribbled away furiously. 발음듣기 그 인터뷰 내내 기자들은 정신없이 글을 갈겨썼다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Throughout the interview the journalists scribbled away furiously. 발음
